Пофіксіть оновлення, інвентар недоступний, матч не запускається, шо за хуйня Valve?

You want to have fun games with nice people? learn to love other cultures and languages?  A noob friendly game without Hackers, Smurfs or toxic players? A perfect game to play with your Family?
Then CS:GO is not for you. You will experience absolute Pain playing this game. Lots of Hackers, everyone is Toxic and racist. 
You will have Fun when you Win a game but if you even come close to Losing your entire Family will be fucked or killed by some random Dude in Europe. You lose a 1v5? You're shit and should die! You carry the whole game but miss 1 shot? You're shit and should die! You're from a part in Europe your teammate doesnt like? You're shit and should die!
You're teammate gets killed on the opposite side of the map because he's bad? You're shit and should die!

So be prepared for absolute toxicity, racism and rage. 


Anyways this game is really fun and the best fps shooter ever. 
10/10

csgo令人着迷，精准爆头时的快感，残局时的血脉喷张，翻盘时的酣畅淋漓。要相信你一直在进步，枪法和意识会越来越好越来越强。傍晚时分和朋友来上一局，那一定是对一天美好生活的升华。享受游戏并且享受人生！

Liebes Team von Valve,
Eure Firma hat echt Großes geleistet. Sie alle besitzen eine unglaubliche Länge. Ich hoffe all ihre Kopfkissen sind heute, und in jeder weiteren Nacht Ihres hoffentlich langen Lebens, von beiden Seiten sehr schön kalt. Ich wünsche Ihnen allen einen tollen Tag oder eine tolle Nacht. 
Mit freundlichen Grüßen 
Ihre Katze aus der Nachbarschaft
